pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Gentle Facial Cleansing Oil 192ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Ultra Gentle Facial Cleansing Oil uses a combination of 8 natural oils to gently lift away impurities and makeup while maintaining the skin's natural moisture balance.

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Ultra Gentle Facial Cleansing Oil is a deep cleansing blend which latches onto excess oils, dirt and impurities and then emulsifies with water to rinse them away completely, leaving skin clear, soft and cleansed with no sign of greasy residue. Ideal for all skin types, this lightweight blend of 8 pure oils and botanicals won't strip away natural moisture, unlike other harsh cleansing methods.

Suitable For: All skin types.

Product Claims: Dissolves impurities and makeup while maintaining skin's natural moisture balance

Size: 192mL

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Ophthalmologist Tested?: Yes

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Removes impurities and makeup while balancing moisture and hydrating skin
• Is a great first step in the cleansing process.
• Safe for sensitive skin
• Dermatologist tested
• Free of parabens, phthlatates, mineral oils and dyes

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Sorbitan Trioleate, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil.

Contains: Cocoa Butter, Vitamin E, Apricot Oil, Sesame Oil, Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Soybean Oil, Grape Seed Oil

Directions

Apply to dampened face, and massage with fingertips. Add a splash of water to work into a light foam, then rinse completely. Safe for removing eye makeup.
